title: Add WhatsApp order notification button to checkout confirmation

requirements.summary: Add WhatsApp notification button to OrderConfirmation that opens WhatsApp with pre-filled order details message to 9919031626
acceptanceCriteria: Button appears on OrderConfirmation page after successful order placement
Button opens WhatsApp with pre-filled message to 9919031626
Message includes customer name, delivery address, phone number, product name, MRP, and delivery charge
Button uses WhatsApp green color scheme and WhatsApp icon
Works on both mobile and desktop devices

file_operations.description: Add WhatsApp notification button below order details that constructs a pre-filled message with customer name, address, phone, product name, MRP, and delivery charge (â‚¹50). Use wa.me/919919031626 link format with URL-encoded message text. Include the WhatsApp icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/whatsapp-icon.dim_48x48.png. Style the button with WhatsApp green (#25D366) and ensure it is responsive for both mobile and desktop. The button should fetch product details using the product ID from the order object to include the product name in the message.
